title: WTB/WTT: Low grade Hall of Famers
author: Bruinsfan94

posts.post_title: WTB/WTT: Low grade Hall of Famers
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy a few low grade hall of famers. Looking for good/decent eye appeal. Have made several deals on here and have gotten some great cards from members on net54.  

Looking for raw/psa/sgc/bvg/gia in the A-2 range. I'm still looking for most in the set.
